init.value: UPDATE employee SET first_name = ?, last_name = ?, ssn = ?, title = ?, phone = ?, address1 = ?, address2 = ?, manager = ?, start_date = ?, ccn = ?, ccn_limit = ?, personal_description = ? WHERE userid = ?;
init.raw: UPDATE employee SET first_name = ?, last_name = ?, ssn = ?, title = ?, phone = ?, address1 = ?, address2 = ?, manager = ?, start_date = ?, ccn = ?, ccn_limit = ?, personal_description = ? WHERE userid = ?;
